GSP28sabbha1u:3: tāni sati saṃbhave tadarthāny eva sūtreṣv ity avagantavyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:4: na adhyāhārādibhir eṣāṃ parikalpanīyo 'rthaḥ paribhāṣitavyo vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:5: evaṃ hi vedavākyāny eva ebhir vyākhyāyante /
GSP28sabbha1u:6: itarathā vedavākyāni vyākhyeyāni svapadārthāś ca vyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:8: tatra loke 'yam athaśabdo vṛttād anantarasya prakriyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:12: tathā hi prasiddhapadārthakaḥ sa kalpito bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:18: ucyate: tādṛśīṃ tu dharmajijñāsām adhikṛtya athaśabdaṃ prayuktavān ācāryaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:20: katham ? vedavākyānām anekavidho vicāra iha vartiṣyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:21: api ca naiva vayam iha vedādhyayanāt pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ pratiṣedhaṃ śiṣmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:22: na hy etad ekaṃ vākyaṃ purastāc ca vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhiṣyati,
GSP28sabbha1u:24: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam anyā hi vacanavyaktir asya purastād vedādhyayanād dharmajijñāsāṃ pratiṣedhataḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:29: kiṃ tv adhīte vede dvayam āpatati,
GSP28sabbha1u:30: gurukulāc ca samāvartitavyaṃ vedavākyāni ca vicārayitavyāni /
GSP28sabbha1u:34: yady evaṃ, na tarhi vedādhyayanaṃ pūrvaṃ dharmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:35: evaṃ hi samāmananti “vedam adhītya snāyāt” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:36: iha ca vedam adhītya snāsyan dharmaṃ jijñāsamāna imam āmnāyam atikrāmet /
GSP28sabbha1u:39: anatikrāmanto vedam arthavantaṃ santam anarthakaṃ kalpayema /
GSP28sabbha1u:41: na ca tasya adhyayanamātrāt tatrabhavanto yājñikāḥ phalaṃ samāmananti /
GSP28sabbha1u:43: tatrāpi “dravyasaṃskārakarmasu parārthatvāt phalaśrutir arthavādaḥ syāt” ity arthavādatāṃ vakṣyati /
GSP28sabbha1u:44: na ca adhītavedasya snānānantaryam etad vidhīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:45: na hy atra ānantaryasya vaktā kaścic chabdo 'sti /
GSP28sabbha1u:50: na ca idaṃ snānam adṛṣṭārthaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:51: kiṃ tu lakṣaṇayā asnānādiniyamasya paryavasānaṃ vedādhyayanasamakālam āhuḥ “vedam adhītya snāyāt“,
GSP28sabbha1u:53: tasmād vedādhyayanam eva pūrvam abhinirvartya anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavya ity athaśabdasya sāmarthyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:54: na brūmaḥ “anyasyāpi karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ dharmajijñāsā na kartavyā” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:55: kiṃ tu “vedam adhītya tvaritena na snātavyam,
GSP28sabbha1u:56: anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ” ity athaśabdasya arthaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:61: anantaraṃ dharmo jijñāsitavyaḥ” ity ataḥśabdasya sāmarthyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:62: dharmāya hi vedavākyāni vicārayitum anadhītavedo na śaknuyāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:64: anantaraṃ dharmaṃ jijñāsitum icched ity ataḥśabdasya arthaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:73: kathaṃlakṣaṇa ity ekenaiva sūtreṇa vyākhyātaṃ “codanalakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ” iti1 /
GSP28sabbha1u:77: kva puruṣaparatvaṃ kva vā puruṣo guṇabhūta ity etāsāṃ pratijñānāṃ piṇḍasya etat sūtram “athāto dharmajijñāsā” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:78: dharmaḥ prasiddho vā syād aprasiddho vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:87: so 'yam avicārya pravartamānaḥ kaṃcid eva upādadāno vihanyeta anarthaṃ ca ṛcchet /
GSP28sabbha1u:89: sa hi niḥśreyasena puruṣaṃ saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:93: codanā iti kriyāyāḥ pravartakaṃ vacanam āhuḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:97: dhūmo lakṣaṇam agner iti hi vadanti /
GSP28sabbha1u:99: so 'rthaḥ puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasena saṃyunakti iti pratijānīmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:100: codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam arthaṃ śaknoty avagamayitum,
GSP28sabbha1u:102: nanv atathābhūtam apy arthaṃ brūyāc codanā,
GSP28sabbha1u:103: yathā yatkiṃcana laukikaṃ vacanaṃ ṅadyās tīre phalāni santi” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:106: ucyate: vipratiṣiddham idam abhidhīyate “bravīti ca vitathaṃ ca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:111: yadi ca codanāyāṃ satyām “agnihotrāt svargo bhavati” ity avagamyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:112: katham ucyate ṅa tathā bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:116: na ca śvargakāmo yajeta” ity ato vacanāt saṃdigdham avagamyate “bhavati vā svargo na vā bhavati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:117: na ca niścitam avagamyamānam idaṃ mithyā syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:118: yo hi janitvā pradhvaṃsate ṅaitad evam” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:120: na caiṣa kālāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare deśāntare vā viparyeti /
GSP28sabbha1u:123: tac cet pratyayitāt puruṣād indriyaviṣayaṃ vā,
GSP28sabbha1u:127: aśakyaṃ hi tat puruṣeṇa jñātum ṛte vacanāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:128: -- aparasmāt pauruṣeyād vacanād avagatam iti cet /
GSP28sabbha1u:135: yathā cakṣuṣā rūpam upalabhyata iti darśanād evāvagatam /
GSP28sabbha1u:136: -- ucyate: upadeśo hi vyāmohād api bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:138: api ca pauruṣeyād vacanād “evam ayaṃ puruṣo veda” iti bhavati pratyayo,
GSP28sabbha1u:140: viplavate khalv api kaścit puruṣakṛtād vacanāt pratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:141: na tu vedavacanasya mithyātve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti /
GSP28sabbha1u:143: pauruṣeyaṃ vacanaṃ vitatham upalabhya vacanasāmānyād vedavacanaṃ mithyety anumīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:145: na hy anyasya vitathabhāve 'nyasya vaitathyaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28sabbha1u:147: na hi devadattasya śyāmatve yajñadattasyāpi śyāmatvaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28sabbha1u:148: api ca puruṣavacanasādharmyād vedava canaṃ vitatham ity anumānam /
GSP28sabbha1u:171: - ko 'narthaḥ? - yaḥ pratyavāyāya śyeno vajra inour ity evamādiḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:172: tatra anartho dharma ukto mā bhūd ity arthagrahaṇam /
GSP28sabbha1u:174: - hiṃsā hi sā, sā ca pratiṣiddhā /
GSP28sabbha1u:178: tasya ayam abhyupāya iti hi teoām upadeśaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:181: nanv aśaktam idaṃ sūtram imāv arthāv abhivaditum,
GSP28sabbha1u:189: tena ca ekadeśaḥ sūtryata iti sūtram /
GSP28sabbha1u:190: tatra bhinnayor eva vākyayor imāv ekadeśāv ity avagantavyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:191: athavā arthasya sataś codanālakṣaṇasya dharmatvam ucyata ity ekārtham eveti /
GSP28sabbha1u:197: kiṃ codanaiva uta anyad api iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:198: tasmān na tāvan niścīyate “codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharma” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:201: Jaim_1,1.4: satsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam animittam,
GSP28sabbha1u:208: sati indriyārthasaṃbandhe yā puruṣasya buddhir jāyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:213: buddhir vā janma vā saṃnikarṣo veti naiṣāṃ kasyacid avadhāraṇārtham etat sūtram /
GSP28sabbha1u:220: Jaim_1,1.5: autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya jñānam upadeśo 'vyatirekaś ca arthe 'nupalabdhe,
GSP28sabbha1u:227: autpattikaḥ śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya agnihotrādilakṣaṇasya dharmasya nimittaṃ pratyakṣādibhir anavagatasya /
GSP28sabbha1u:231: na hi tad utpannaṃ jñānaṃ viparyeti /
GSP28sabbha1u:232: yac ca nāma jñānam utpannaṃ na viparyeti,
GSP28sabbha1u:233: na tac chakyate vaktuṃ ṅaitad evam” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:240: evaṃ vadato viruddham idam avagamyate “asti nāsti ca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:243: na hy evaṃ sati pratyayāntaram apekṣitavyaṃ puruṣāntaraṃ vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:247: vṛttikāras tv anyathemaṃ granthaṃ varṇayāṃcakāra tasya nimittaparīṣṭir ity evamādim :
GSP28sabbha1u:249: pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstram /
GSP28sabbha1u:255: tatrāparīkṣya pravartamāno 'rthād vihanyeta anarthaṃ cāpnuyāt kadācit /
GSP28sabbha1u:262: Jaim_1,1.4a: tatsaṃprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma sat pratyakṣam /
GSP28sabbha1u:264: tenaiva saṃprayoge indriyāṇāṃ puruṣasya buddhijanma sat pratyakṣam /
GSP28sabbha1u:273: yadā hi śuktikāyām api rajataṃ manyamano “rajatasaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ me cakṣur” iti manyate?
GSP28sabbha1u:274: - bādhakaṃ hi yatra jñānam utpadyate ṅaitad evaṃ,
GSP28sabbha1u:279: yadā na tatkāle saṃyagjñānasya mithyājñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣaḥ?
GSP28sabbha1u:293: - prayatnena anvicchanto na ced doṣam upalabhemahi,
GSP28sabbha1u:295: tasmād yasya ca duṣṭaṃ karaṇaṃ yatra ca mithyeti pratyayaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:296: sa eva asamīcīnaḥ pratyayo nānya iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:297: nanu sarva eva nirālambanaḥ svapnavat pratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:298: pratyayasya hi nirālambanatā svabhāva upalakṣitaḥ svapne /
GSP28sabbha1u:299: jāgrato 'pi śtambha” iti vā “kuḍyam” iti vā pratyaya eva bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:301: ucyate: śtambha” iti jāgrato buddhiḥ supariniścitā kathaṃ viparyasiṣyati?
GSP28sabbha1u:302: - svapne 'py evam eva supariniścitā āsīt prāk prabodhanāt,
GSP28sabbha1u:303: na tatra kaścid viśeṣa iti cen,
GSP28sabbha1u:310: na śakyate “pratyayād ayam anya” iti vaditum /
GSP28sabbha1u:311: anyatas tu svapnapratyayasya mithyābhāvo viparyayād avagataḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:313: - sanidrasya manaso daurbalyān nidrā mithyābhāvasya hetuḥ svapnādau svapnānte ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:315: acetayan eva hi śuṣupta” ity ucyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:321: prabuddho hy avagacchati ṅidrākrāntaṃ me mana āsīd” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:325: atas tadbhinnam artharūpaṃ nāma na kiṃcid asti iti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:332: kṣaṇikā hi sā na buddhyantarakālam avasthāsyata iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:333: utpadyamānaivāsau jñāyate jñāpayati cārthāntaraṃ pradīpavad iti yady ucyeta, tan na /
GSP28sabbha1u:334: na hy ajñāte 'rthe kaścid buddhim upalabhate,
GSP28sabbha1u:337: - nanu utpannāyām eva buddhāv artho “jñāta” ity ucyate nānutpannāyām /
GSP28sabbha1u:345: na ca arthavyapadeśam antareṇa buddhe rūpopalambhanam /
GSP28sabbha1u:349: api ca kāmam ekarūpatve buddher evābhāvo,
GSP28sabbha1u:355: api ca niyatanimittas tantuṣv evopādīyamāneṣu paṭapratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:356: itarathā tantūpādāne 'pi kadācid ghaṭabuddhir avikalendriyasya syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:360: anumānaṃ jñātasaṃbandhasya ekadeśadarśanād ekadeśāntare ' saṃnikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhiḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:361: tat tu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:363: sāmānyatodṛṣṭasaṃbandhaṃ ca yathā devadattasya gatipūrvikāṃ deśāntaraprāptim upalabhya āditye 'pi gatismaraṇam /
GSP28sabbha1u:365: upamānam api sādṛśyam asaṃnikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhim utpādayati,
GSP28sabbha1u:367: arthāpattir api dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā 'rtho 'nyathā nopapadyata ity arthakalpanā,
GSP28sabbha1u:368: yathā jīvato devadattasya gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasya adṛṣṭasya kalpanā /
GSP28sabbha1u:371: nanu pratyakādīny anyāni bhavantu nāma pramāṇāni,
GSP28sabbha1u:386: na kālāntare phalam iṣṭer ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:387: - kutaḥ ? - yadā tāvad asau vidyamānā āsīt,
GSP28sabbha1u:392: api ca karmakāla eva phalaṃ śrūyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:397: na ca dṛṣṭe kāraṇe saty adṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:399: evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādy api phalaṃ na bhavati iti manyāmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:400: dṛṣṭaviruddham api bhavati kiṃcid vaidikaṃ vacanam /
GSP28sabbha1u:401: pātracayanaṃ vidhāya āha śa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yāti” iti pratyakṣaṃ śarīraṃ vyapadiśati /
GSP28sabbha1u:402: na ca tat svargaṃ lokaṃ yāti /
GSP28sabbha1u:405: evaṃjātīyakaṃ ca pramāṇaviruddhaṃ vacanam apramāṇam “ambuni majjanty alābūni,
GSP28sabbha1u:409: Jaim_1,1.5a: autpattikas tu śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya jñānam //
GSP28sabbha1u:411: apauruṣeyaḥ śabdasyārthena saṃbandhas tasya agnihotrādilakṣaṇasya arthasya jñānaṃ pratyakṣādibhir anavagamyamānasya /
GSP28sabbha1u:413: pauruṣeye hi sati saṃbandhe yaḥ pratyayaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:416: atha śabde bruvati kathaṃ mithyā iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:417: na hi tadānīm anyataḥ puruṣād avagamaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:421: kathaṃ vipralabdhaṃ brūyān ṅaitad evam” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:422: na cāsya codanā śyād vā na vā” iti sāṃśayikaṃ pratyayam utpādayati /
GSP28sabbha1u:423: na ca “mithyaitad” iti kālāntare deśāntare 'vasthāntare puruṣāntare vā punar avyapadeśyaḥ pratyayo bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:424: yo 'py anyapratyayaviparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā “atrāpi viparyasiṣyati” ity ānumānikaḥ pratyaya utpadyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:425: so 'py anena pratyakṣeṇa pratyayena virudhyamāno bādhyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:433: kāryakāraṇanimittanaimittikāśrayāśrayibhāvayaunādayas tu saṃbandhāḥ śabdasya anupapannā eva iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:436: pratyāyyasya pratyāyakasya ca yaḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñilakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhas tam iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:441: ṅa prathamaśruta” iti prathamaśravaṇe pratyayam adṛṣṭvā /
GSP28sabbha1u:445: yathā cakṣur draṣṭṛ na bāhyena prakāśena vinā prakāśayati ity adraṣṭṛ na bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:448: - kutaḥ? - - svabhāvato hy asaṃbandhāv etau śabdārthau /
GSP28sabbha1u:452: artho 'yaṃ na śabda” iti ca vyapadiśanti /
GSP28sabbha1u:461: śrotragrahaṇe hy arthe loke śabdaśabdaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:465: na ca akṣaravyatirikto 'nyaḥ kaścid asti samudāyo nāmna,
GSP28sabbha1u:473: antarhite 'pi śabde smaraṇād arthapratyaya iti cen, - na /
GSP28sabbha1u:476: nanv evam api “śabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmaha” iti laukikaṃ vacanam anupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:479: na hi laukikaṃ vacanam anupapannam ity etāvatā pratyakṣādibhir anavagamyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyo 'bhyupagantum /
GSP28sabbha1u:480: laukikāni vacanāny upapannārthāny anupapannārthāni ca dṛśyante,
GSP28sabbha1u:482: gām abhyāja” ity evamādīni “daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍ apūpā” ity evamādīni ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:483: - nanu ca śāstrakārā apy evam āhuḥ “pūrvāparībhūtaṃ bhāvam ākhyātenācaṣṭe 'vrajati,
GSP28sabbha1u:484: pacati' ity upakramaprabhṛty apavargaparyantam” iti yathā /
GSP28sabbha1u:485: - na śāstrakāravacanam apy alam imam artham apramāṇakam upapādayitum /
GSP28sabbha1u:488: saṃskārād arthapratipattir iti bhavanty arthapratipattāv akṣarāṇi nimittam /
GSP28sabbha1u:493: na “gauṇaḥ śabdo mā bhūd” ity etāvatā pratyakṣādibhir anavagamyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyaḥ parikalpayitum /
GSP28sabbha1u:494: na hy “agnir māṇavaka” ity ukte 'gniśabdo gauṇo mā bhūd iti “jvalana eva māṇavaka” ity adhyavasīyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:495: na ca pratyakṣo gakārādibhyo 'nyo gośabda iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:498: tasmād “gaur” iti gakārādivisarjanīyāntaṃ padam akṣarāṇy eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:499: na tebhyo vyatiriktam anyat padaṃ nāma iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:501: - ucyate: śabdakalpanāyāṃ sā ca śabdakalpanā ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:505: - nanv ākṛtiḥ sādhyāsti vā na veti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:506: - na pratyakṣā satī sādhyā bhavitum arhati /
GSP28sabbha1u:511: asaty apy arthāntara evaṃjātīyake bhavati pratyayaḥ “paṅktir ,
GSP28sabbha1u:515: kim “asati vane vanapratyayo bhavati” iti pratyakṣam eva ākṣipyate “vṛkṣā api na santi” iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:516: yady evaṃ, pratyuktaḥ sa mahāyānikaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:517: atha kim ākṛtisadbhāvavādy upālabhyate śiddhāntāntaraṃ te duṣyati ;
GSP28sabbha1u:519: evam api prakṛtaṃ dūṣayitum aśaknuvatas te siddhāntāntaradūṣaṇaṃ nigrahasthānam āpadyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:523: kiṃ tena duṣṭena aduṣṭena vā prakṛtaṃ tvayā sādhitaṃ bhavati madīyo vā pakṣo dūṣito bhavati ?” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:524: na ca vṛkṣavyatiriktaṃ vanaṃ yasmān nopalabhyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:526: yadi vane 'nyena hetunā sadbhāvaviparītaḥ pratyaya utpadyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:527: mithyaiṣa vanapratyaya ity ato “vanaṃ nāsti” ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:538: sa tu kṛtaka iti pūrvam upapāditam /
GSP28sabbha1u:539: tasmān manyāmahe kenāpi puruṣeṇa śabdānām arthaiḥ saha saṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā saṃvyavahartuṃ vedāḥ praṇītā iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:542: kathaṃ punar idam avagamyate “apauruṣeya eṣa saṃbandha” iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:546: nanu ciravṛttatvāt pratyakṣasya aviṣayo bhaved idānīntanānām /
GSP28sabbha1u:547: na hi ciravṛttaḥ san na smaryeta /
GSP28sabbha1u:548: na ca himavadādiṣu kūpārāmādivad asmaraṇaṃ bhavitum arhati /
GSP28sabbha1u:549: puruṣaviyogo hi teṣu bhavati deśotsādena kulotsādena vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:551: - syād etat : saṃbandhamātravyavahāriṇo niṣprayojanaṃ kartṛsmaraṇam anādriyamānāḥ puruṣā vismareyur iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:553: yadi hi puruṣaḥ kṛtvā saṃbandhaṃ vyavahārayet,
GSP28sabbha1u:557: na hi vṛddhiśabdena apāṇiner vyavahārata ādaicaḥ pratiyeran pāṇinikṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:558: tathā makāreṇāpy apiṅgalasya na sarvagurus trikaḥ pratīyeta piṅgalakṛtim ananumanyamānasya vā /
GSP28sabbha1u:560: tena vedair vyavaharadbhir avaśyam smaraṇīyaḥ saṃbandhasya kartā syād vyavahārasya ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:561: na hi vismṛte “vṛddhir ādaij” ity asya sūtrasya kartari “vṛddhir yasyācām ādis,
GSP28sabbha1u:563: tasmād asmaraṇād avagacchāmaḥ ṅa kṛtvā saṃbandhaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ kenacid vedāḥ praṇītā” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:565: tathāpi na pramāṇam antareṇa saṃbandhāraṃ pratipadyemahi,
GSP28sabbha1u:566: yathā “vidyamānasyāpy anupalambhanaṃ bhavati” iti naitāvatā vinā pramāṇena śaśaviṣāṇaṃ pratipadyemahi /
GSP28sabbha1u:569: na hi akṛtasaṃbandhāc chabdād arthaṃ pratipadyamānam upalabhāmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:572: tadanupalambhanād avaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ saṃbandhrā iti manyāmaha iti cet, - na /
GSP28sabbha1u:574: yadi saṃbandhur abhāvān niyogato nārthā upalabhyeran,
GSP28sabbha1u:577: vṛddhānāṃ svārthena vyavaharamānānām upaśṛṇvanto bālāḥ pratyakṣam arthaṃ pratipadyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP28sabbha1u:580: te 'py anyebhya iti nāsty ādir ity evaṃ vā bhavet /
GSP28sabbha1u:581: athavā na kaścid eko 'pi śabdo 'rthena saṃbaddha āsīt,
GSP28sabbha1u:583: atra vṛddhavyavahāre sati nārthād āpadyeta saṃbandhasya kartā /
GSP28sabbha1u:586: na ca pratyakṣe pratyarthini kalpanā sādhvī /
GSP28sabbha1u:597: yasmin na kaścid api śabdaḥ kenacid arthena saṃbaddha āsīt /
GSP28sabbha1u:599: avaśyam anena saṃbandhaṃ kurvatā kenacic chabdena kartavyaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:605: tasmād avaśyam anena saṃbandhaṃ kurvatā akṛtasaṃbandhāḥ kecana śabdā vṛddhavyavahārasiddhā abhyupagantavyāḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:607: na niyogataḥ saṃbandhā bhavitavyam ity arthāpattir api nāsti /
GSP28sabbha1u:608: - syād etat: aprasiddhasaṃbandhā bālāḥ kathaṃ vṛddhebhyaḥ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:614: anupalabdhe ca devatādāv arthe 'narthakaṃ saṃjñākaraṇam aśakyaṃ ca /
GSP28sabbha1u:615: viśeṣān pratipattuṃ hi saṃjñāḥ kriyante viśeṣāṃś coddiśya /
GSP28sabbha1u:616: tad viśeṣeṣv ajñāyamāneṣu ubhayam apy anavakḷptam /
GSP28sabbha1u:621: na hy evaṃ sati puruṣāntaraṃ pratyayāntaraṃ vā apekṣate /
GSP28sabbha1u:625: karmakāle phalādarśanāt kālāntare ca karmābhāvāt pramāṇaṃ nāsti” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:634: pramāṇāntareṇa anavagatam ity etāvatā anavagataṃ bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:635: na caivaṃ śrūyate “kṛte karmaṇi tāvaty eva phalaṃ bhavati“,
GSP28sabbha1u:637: - yac ca “kālāntare phalasya anyat pratyakkaṃ kāraṇam asti” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:639: tac caiva hi tatra kāraṇaṃ śabdaś ca iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:640: yat tu pratyakaviruddhaṃ vacanam upanyastaṃ śa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātīti pratyakṣaṃ śarīraṃ vyapadiśati” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:647: yo 'sau prāṇiti apāniti ucchvasiti nimiṣati ityādi ceṣṭitavān,
GSP28sabbha1u:649: - nanu śarīram eva prāṇity apāniti ca ?
GSP28sabbha1u:654: prāṇādayas tu saty api śarīre na bhavanti /
GSP28sabbha1u:659: āha : kuta eṣa saṃpratyayaḥ śukhādibhyo 'nyas tadvān asti” iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:660: na hi sukhādipratyākhyānena tasya svarūpam upalabhāmahe /
GSP28sabbha1u:662: - athocyate: tena vinā kasya sukhādaya iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:668: na hi candramasam ādityaṃ vā upalabhya saṃbandhyantarānveoaṇā bhavati “kasyāyam” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:672: - tata ātmānam apy anena prakāreṇa upalabhya “kasyāyam” iti saṃbandhyantaram anviṣyema /
GSP28sabbha1u:673: tam api kalpayitvā 'nyam api kalpayitvā 'nyam ity anavasthaiva syāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:674: atha kaṃcit kalpayitvā na saṃbandhyantaram api kalpayiṣyasi tāvaty eva viraṃsyasi tāvatā ca paritokṣyasi,
GSP28sabbha1u:675: tato vijñāna eva parituṣya tāvaty eva virantum arhasi /
GSP28sabbha1u:676: atrocyate: yadi vijñānād anyo vijñātā nāsti,
GSP28sabbha1u:679: tad eṣa śabdo 'rthavān kartavya iti jñānād vyatiriktam ātmānaṃ kalpayiṣyāma iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:680: āha : devā enaṃ śabdam arthavantaṃ kalpayiṣyanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:683: asty ātmā” ity ātmasattāvādina eva śabdasya pratyakṣavaktāro bhavanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:688: - katham ? - upalabdhapūrve hy abhiprete bhavati icchā,
GSP28sabbha1u:690: yathā merum uttareṇa yāny asmajjātīyair anupalabdhapūrvāṇi svādūni vṛkṣaphalāni,
GSP28sabbha1u:692: no khalv anyena puruṣeṇa upalabdhe 'pi viṣaye 'nyasyānupalabdhur icchā bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:701: atrāha : anupapannam iti naḥ kva saṃpratyayaḥ ?
GSP28sabbha1u:705: tac chaśaviṣāṇavad eva nāsti ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:709: na ca jñātari vijñānād anyasmin asati jñāne cānitye aparedyur icchā anupapannā,
GSP28sabbha1u:711: no khalv apy etad dṛṣṭaṃ “ya evānyedyur upalabhā,
GSP28sabbha1u:713: idaṃ tu dṛṣṭaṃ yat “kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anya icchati,
GSP28sabbha1u:714: kvacin na ; samānāyāṃ santatāv anya icchati,
GSP28sabbha1u:717: atrocyate: na hy “asmartāra icchanti” ity upapadyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:721: pūrvavijñānasadṛśaṃ vijñānaṃ pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vā smṛtir ity ucyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:722: tac ca draṣṭari vinaṣṭe 'py aparedyur utpadyamānaṃ nānupapannam,
GSP28sabbha1u:728: “vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny eva anuvinaśyati:
GSP28sabbha1u:731: anyedyur dṛṣṭe 'paredyur “aham idam adarśam” iti bhavati pratyayaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:740: atrocyate: na vayam “aham” itīmaṃ śabdaṃ prayujyamānam anyasmin arthe hetutvena vyapadiśāmaḥ,
GSP28sabbha1u:742: pratīmo hi vayam imam arthaṃ “vayam evānyedyur upalabhāmahe,
GSP28sabbha1u:744: tasmād vayam imam artham avagacchāmo “vayam eva hyo,
GSP28sabbha1u:749: śa vāre 'yam ātmā” iti prakṛtya āmananti “aśīryo na hi śīryata” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:752: tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa ity avagacchāmaḥ /
GSP28sabbha1u:753: na ca śakyam evam avagantuṃ “yathopalabhyante 'rthā na tathā bhavanti,
GSP28sabbha1u:754: yathā tu khalu nopalabhyante tathā bhavanti” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:757: na ca ahampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28sabbha1u:760: evaṃ cet, sa eva yajñāyudhī iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:761: āha : yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ,
GSP28sabbha1u:762: vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām “idaṃ tad īdṛśaṃ ca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:768: yathā ca kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati na ca śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayituṃ,
GSP28sabbha1u:769: na ca “tan na śakyate nidarśayitum” ity etāvatā ṅāsti” ity avagamyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:770: evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum,
GSP28sabbha1u:771: anyasya draṣṭus taṃ puruṣaṃ prati darśanaśaktyabhāvāt /
GSP28sabbha1u:772: so 'py anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate,
GSP28sabbha1u:774: tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva,
GSP28sabbha1u:776: athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ ?
GSP28sabbha1u:779: pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati “agṛhyo na hi gṛhyata” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:780: pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat /
GSP28sabbha1u:784: kena punar upāyena ayam anyasmai kathyata iti ?
GSP28sabbha1u:785: - atrāpy upāye brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati śa eṣa neti nety ātmneti hovāca” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:786: asāv “ayam evaṃrūpa” iti na śakyate nidarśayitum /
GSP28sabbha1u:792: asti śarīrād anyaḥ sa cātmā” iti śarīrapratiṣedhena ātmopadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:793: tathā prāṇādayo nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:794: tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgair upalabhyante /
GSP28sabbha1u:795: te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiledhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate /
GSP28sabbha1u:797: na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api puruṣapravṛttyā anumīyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:798: yadā ' sau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate /
GSP28sabbha1u:799: ataḥ pravṛttyāvagamyate ṅūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchati” iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:800: upamānāc copadiśyate “yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati,
GSP28sabbha1u:801: anenopamānenāvagaccha “aham api tādṛśam eva paśyāmi” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:802: yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣśīta “dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28sabbha1u:805: ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:806: yad apy ucyate “vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:808: na śakyam upāyam antareṇa upeyam upetum /
GSP28sabbha1u:809: ayam evābhyupāyo jñatavyānām arthānāṃ “yo yathā jñāyate,
GSP28sabbha1u:817: ” tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28sabbha1u:818: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati /
GSP28sabbha1u:819: apratīte 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:821: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyaka ity etat pūrvam evoktam /
GSP28sabbha1u:822: tad avaśyakartavye 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy uktam eva /
GSP28sabbha1u:823: tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP28sabbha1u:824: atha yad uktaṃ “vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati,
GSP28sabbha1u:826: atrocyate: “atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam āpīpadad” iti 1 paricodanottarakāle 'pahnutya mohāntābhiprāyam asya vacanasya varṇitavān ṅa vāre 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmi,
GSP28sabbha1u:831: yad uktaṃ ṅa caiṣa “yāti” iti vidhiśabda” iti,
GSP28sabbha1u:833: śvargakāmo yajeta” iti vacanāntareṇa avagatam anuvadiṣyate /
